pageProduct.name: Skin Control Breakout Bar 100g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

The cleansing bar combating acne prone and oily skin.

Warnings

Soap is for external use only. Rinse skin thoroughly after use. If irritation occurs, please discontinue use. If soap gets into eyes, rinse well with water.

Common Uses

Helps draw out bacteria
Removes excess oil
Reduces redness and inflammation
Helps keep skin clear and healthy
Cruelty free
Made from natural ingredients
Australian Made

Ingredients

Sodium Palmate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Water, Glycerine, Sodium Gluconate, Melaleuca Alternafolia Leaf (Tea Tree) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sodium Chloride, Charcoal Powder, Salicylic Acid
